Plastic-based products would lose their durability and lifespan, as they would break down quickly.
The plastic industry would need to develop new technologies to keep up with the fast degradation rate.
The environment would see a significant reduction in plastic waste, as it would break down and disappear faster.
Microplastics would still be a problem, as they would break down into smaller pieces and be more difficult to filter out.
The economy would be affected as the demand for plastic products would decrease due to their shorter lifespan.
